amendment.description: Amendment adds to the bill the text of the Homeland Security Information Sharing Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record of July 23, 2002.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Chambliss. (consideration: CR H5441-5444; text: CR H5442-5443

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chambliss amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
